# thunder_ip_dns_suffix (Resource)

`thunder_ip_dns_suffix`: DNS suffix

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_ip_dns_suffix" "thunder_ip_dns_suffix" {
  domain_name = "A10test"
}
```
